about_the_game:
Demo Content

I am pleased to present to you the demo version of the game Trapped Souls
In the demo you will: get to know the main characters, earn to avoid traps and obstacles in dark dungeons, collect equipment and upgrade it, learn to fight and level up the character and save the cat

Completing the demo game can take up to 1-2 hours (depending on the play style and skill)
Game progress stops at step 30, in the dungeon of the first boss. So player will be able to experience most of the mechanics of the game.

After step 30 the player loses the dungeon progress, but can continue playing the demo further. It is also necessary to take into account that this is a roguelike, so there is more content than can be seen with that attempt.

Solo and split screen modes are available

Full Game Description

You are a homunculus slave, who is forced to work in the mine. By taking a chance to escape you finds yourself in the catacombs of the ancient crypt of King Tarrius. Because of the curse, the soul of anyone who sets foot here becomes forever trapped in this crypt. To lift the curse, you will have to explore the dangerous levels of the crypt, which are full of powerful enemies and deadly obstacles. Develop your character and upgrade your gear. Use the help of other trapped souls to pass the challenges that have fallen to your fate.

Features:

Action combat
The combat system is inspired by the best souls like games. Your actions drain stamina, so it's important to balance offense and defense. Use dodge roll to avoid incoming attacks, or block them with a shield.

RPG

Level up your character and distribute attribute points. Collect gold in dangerous places and sell unwanted loot. Find or buy gear that fits your playing style.

loot

Find weapons and armor of different qualities that affect base item attributes. Items can also be enchanted with special magical attributes. The socketing mechanic will allow you to insert gems into equipment to obtain desired attributes such as fire damage or poison resist

Roguelike dungeon

In your adventures you will have to go through various dark dungeons. To progress you roll two dice. However, you have to choose only one of them which will define the challange you will have to face.

Splitscreen co-op

Play campaign with up to 4 players. Each player has their own loot, gold, and character level.

lore

The events of the game are part of the Crown of Infinity universe . If you like to delve into lore, you will find that many characters and items have a backstory. (The events of Trapped Souls take place eight centuries after the events of No King No Kingdom)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64x or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepads required for co-op play.(default settings are for xbox controller)

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Trapped Souls is a dark fantasy RPG inspired by the souls-like combat system and roguelike randomized challenges and loot.
